Text: Whoa, this is great - thanks! I never expected to see any books in this series except A Case of Conscience.

Note that the 1st book, A Case Of Conscience, has 3 missing pages and about 30 typos.  These issues have been corrected in an improved edit at this link:
https://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/8577131
It also includes a table of contents with chapters.

The other books in this torrent are the retail versions, so should be good.
